TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceView extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSourceView

summary.span: 支援 控制項，且提供資料繫結控制項的介面來執行 LINQ 資料作業。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別主要為了用於資料繫結控制項，而不是網頁程式碼中的可程式化物件。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 網頁開發人員通常會使用與資料互動的控制項。Page developers typically use the control to interact with data. ASP.NET 資料來源控制項包含一個或多個資料來源檢視物件所代表的資料清單。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 類別會擴充類別。The class extends the class. 它定義的功能控制項與其相關聯，以及它實作的資料來源控制項的基本資料功能。It defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and it implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 類別會實作，[更新]()，[插入]()，和[刪除]()作業。The class implements the , [Update](), [Insert](), and [Delete]() operations. 此外，它也會實作排序、 篩選，以及管理會保留在檢視狀態的設定。It also implements sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 雖然物件並未直接公開網頁開發人員，可以透過存取其屬性和方法的許多控制項。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers, many of its properties and methods can be accessed through the control. 控制項實作的下列資料擷取方法和事件，並以公開這些網頁開發人員，並透過相關聯的其他呼叫端控制項：The control implements the following data retrieval methods and events and exposes them to page developers and to other callers through the associated control: - 屬性。The property. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. 您可以排序的資料，您使用擷取加控制`OrderBy`子句。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an `OrderBy` clause. 您可以提供的排序運算式藉由設定執行個體屬性物件傳遞至方法。You can provide a sort expression for the instance by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 語法屬性是相同的語法屬性。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 控制實作介面並使用檢視狀態來追蹤其狀態在頁面的要求。The control implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 實作屬性和， ，和方法可供啟用控制項檢視狀態追蹤。Implementations of the property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view-state tracking for the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

summary.span: 將指定的 控制項設定為目前檢視的擁有者，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the specified control as the owner of the current view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會呼叫[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法以傳回具有指定的資料來源檢視的新執行個體`name`參數。The constructor is called by the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter. 只有一個物件相關聯控制項一次。Only one object is associated with a control at a time. 名稱物件永遠是`DefaultView`，雖然此命名限制所加諸不是由控制控制項。The name of the object is always `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not by the control. 您可以覆寫[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法，以支援使用不同的命名慣例的檢視。You can override the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to support views that use a different naming convention. 所傳遞的執行個體`context`參數用來存取參數集合的資料來源檢視。The instance that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter collections.

summary.span: 取得值，表示與目前 控制項關聯的 物件除了支援擷取資料之外，是否還支援擷取資料列的總數。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項使用可以分頁來決定如何呈現分頁控制項的資料列的總數。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 比方說，這個值用來判斷多少的數字頁面巡覽區按鈕，來呈現在控制呼叫器。For example, this value is used to determine how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 如果[LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]()屬性設定為`false`，您必須手動設定總計資料列計數事件。If the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you must manually set the total row count in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請確定您呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When you override the method in a derived class, make sure that you call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
